title_en: System X: A Mobile Voice-Based AI System for EMR Generation and Clinical Decision Support in Low-Resource Maternal Healthcare
title_zh: System X：一种面向资源匮乏地区孕产保健的、基于移动语音的电子病历生成与临床决策支持人工智能系统
summary_en: We present the design, implementation, and in-situ deployment of a smartphone-based voice-enabled AI system for generating electronic medical records (EMRs) and clinical risk alerts in maternal healthcare settings. Targeted at low-resource environments such as Pakistan, the system integrates a fine-tuned, multilingual automatic speech recognition (ASR) model and a prompt-engineered large language model (LLM) to enable healthcare workers to engage naturally in Urdu, their native language, regardless of literacy or technical background. Through speech-based input and localized understanding, the system generates structured EMRs and flags critical maternal health risks. Over a seven-month deployment in a not-for-profit hospital, the system supported the creation of over 500 EMRs and flagged over 300 potential clinical risks. We evaluate the system's performance across speech recognition accuracy, EMR field-level correctness, and clinical relevance of AI-generated red flags. Our results demonstrate that speech based AI interfaces, can be effectively adapted to real-world healthcare settings, especially in low-resource settings, when combined with structured input design, contextual medical dictionaries, and clinician-in-the-loop feedback loops. We discuss generalizable design principles for deploying voice-based mobile healthcare AI support systems in linguistically and infrastructurally constrained settings.
summary_zh: 本文介绍了一种基于智能手机、支持语音交互的人工智能系统的设计、实施与实地部署。该系统用于在孕产保健场景中生成电子病历（EMR）并发出临床风险警报。该系统主要面向巴基斯坦等资源匮乏环境，集成了一个经过微调的多语言自动语音识别（ASR）模型和一个经过提示工程优化的大语言模型（LLM），使得医护人员能够使用其母语乌尔都语进行自然交互，无需考虑其文化水平或技术背景。通过基于语音的输入和本地化理解，该系统能够生成结构化的电子病历，并标记出关键的孕产健康风险。在一家非营利医院为期七个月的部署中，该系统辅助创建了500多份电子病历，并标记了300多个潜在的临床风险。我们从语音识别准确率、电子病历字段级正确性以及人工智能生成风险警示的临床相关性等方面评估了系统性能。结果表明，结合结构化输入设计、上下文医学词典以及临床医生在环的反馈机制，基于语音的人工智能界面能够有效适应现实世界的医疗保健环境，尤其是在资源匮乏的环境中。我们讨论了在语言和基础设施受限的环境中部署基于语音的移动医疗人工智能支持系统时可推广的设计原则。
